snippet.title: HELL CRUSHER DOOM All Weapons Showcase
snippet.description:
HellCrusher Mod for DOOM All Weapons Showcase, together with the Brutal Doom Monsters Only addon and the music from Jupiter Video Game Remixes, links below. The maps used in the showcase are the Diabolus Ex, Darkstar, Ultimate Torment & Torture Supportive Version & MMDCXIV Journey Into 27 Century. The actual weapon descriptions were provided by the mod's creator himself, The Hellwalker. In this mod our protagonist has access to incredibly powerful arms and you can start with one of the five sidearms, all of them are unique. You also have access to the Equipment Launcher that has three functions, similar to DOOM Eternal - Grenade Launcher, Ice Bombs and Flame Belch.

00:00 - Fists
00:32 - Hell Crusher Hammer
01:00 - Equipment Launcher
01:58 - Black Talons
02:23 - Mammoth Tusk
02:57 - Boom Stick
03:28 - Executioner Hand Cannon
03:48 - Infinity Magnum
04:18 - Jackhammer Blunderbuss
04:48 - Devil's Cry Hexashotgun
05:18 - Apocalypse Killer Cannon
05:53 - Fear's End Chaingun
06:28 - Deimos Harbinger Launcher
07:13 - Plasmatic Lance Rifle
07:42 - Helios Gauss Cannon
08:13 - Hideous Destructor

My Discord Server - https://discord.gg/skpZWagjTJ
Hell Crusher - https://forum.zdoom.org/viewtopic.php?t=72084
Brutal Doom Monsters Only - https://www.moddb.com/mods/brutal-doom/downloads/bdv21-monsters-only-version
Music - The Slayer Path https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5LR22ukkrVM &  04:10 Cultist Base Cyberpunk Remix https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MSz_3kA5PtE
Maps - Diabolus Ex, Darkstar, Ultimate Torment & Torture, MMDCXIV Journey Into 27 Century
